revised_title: Magnetical Experiments and a Unique Liquor Made of Cyder-Apples and Mulberries
tldr: Sam. Colepress shares his observations on magnetic experiments involving a loadstone and a hot nail. He also describes a unique and flavorful liquor made from cyder-apples and mulberries. This drink is easy to make and could be a delightful treat for those who enjoy cyder.
